name: Cognition IP
headline: Flat-fee patent & trademark counsel with top firm results
description:
Cognition IP is a tech-powered San Francisco based intellectual property law firm with partners who have represented some of the most innovative companies in the world in many aspects of intellectual property planning, including Apple, Salesforce, Purdue, Hewlett Packard, AstraZeneca, and Texas Instruments.

Offering patent and trademark filing and prosecution, innovation harvesting and portfolio management, Cognition IP supports early stage startups to Fortune 500 enterprises with on-demand, flat-fee IP counsel and the results expected from a top-tier firm.

Schedule a complimentary consultation at: https://www.CognitionIP.com
generated_description:
Cognition IP is an innovative intellectual property (IP) law firm based in San Francisco, founded in 2018 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W18. The firm specializes in providing flat-fee patent and trademark counsel, delivering high-quality results typically expected from top-tier firms. Its mission is straightforward: make IP accessible and manageable for businesses of all sizes, from early-stage startups to Fortune 500 companies.

At the helm of this venture are seasoned partners who have honed their expertise by representing some of the most recognizable names in tech, including Apple, Salesforce, and Hewlett Packard. This experience translates into robust support for their clients—whether drafting, filing, and prosecuting patents or managing comprehensive IP portfolios.

Cognition IP's offerings cover a wide array of services such as innovation harvesting and portfolio management, all delivered in a cost-effective manner that shields clients from unpredictable legal expenses. They utilize advanced technology and data analytics to inform their strategies, ensuring that they stay ahead in the complex world of IP.

Their team of 12, including notable Group Partner Nan, prides itself on a transparent pricing model and a hands-on approach that distinguishes them in the legal landscape. They understand that building an IP portfolio shouldn't be a daunting task riddled with uncertainty or anxiety. Instead, they focus on removing barriers—be it time, cost, or worry—allowing clients to concentrate on their core businesses.

The firm's reputation is bolstered by positive testimonials from clients who appreciate the depth of service and the proactive engagement from the Cognition IP team. They have been featured in respected media outlets, further solidifying their status as a reliable partner in IP management.

In short, Cognition IP is not just another law firm; it's a tech-savvy ally in the pursuit of intellectual property, bringing the expertise of top-tier representation to every client, wrapped in a predictable and fair pricing structure. If you’re interested in connecting, they offer complimentary consultations to help you navigate your IP needs—reach out at [CognitionIP.com](https://www.cognitionip.com).
